title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
00:06 <sburjan\_> has joined #xwiki  
00:07 <sburjan`> has quit  
00:07 <sburjan\_> is now known as <sburjan`>  
00:28 <sburjan`> has quit  
00:28 <sburjan`> has joined #xwiki  
01:52 <abusenius> has quit  
02:19 <sdumitriu> has quit  
03:43 <DrLou> has quit  
03:47 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
03:47 <@sdumitriu> cjdelisle: Up?  
03:47 <@sdumitriu> Guess who caused XAANNOTATIONS-46  
03:53 <+sburjan`> sdumitriu: did you found out what caused it ?  
03:53 <@sdumitriu> Yes  
03:53 <+sburjan`> tell me, I'm curious  
03:53 <@sdumitriu> Hey, what are you doing up at this hour?  
03:53 <@sdumitriu> I posted a comment on the issue  
03:53 <+sburjan`> just got home :)  
03:53 <@sdumitriu> Can you also read the comment on XE-846 ?  
03:54 <+sburjan`> yes  
03:55 <+sburjan`> you can close it as won't fix  
03:55 <+sburjan`> I don't expect all my issues to be solved, just want to make sure devs are aware of them  
03:55 <+sburjan`> and the decision is theirs regarding on what is okay and what is not  
03:56 <@sdumitriu> Yep, that's good  
03:56 <@sdumitriu> Almost all the issues on http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/TestReports/TestJiras are fixed  
03:57 <@sdumitriu> Also, I can't reproduce XE-825  
03:57 <+sburjan`> on IE8 ?  
03:58 <@sdumitriu> On any IE  
03:58 <+sburjan`> no, this happens only on IE8  
03:58 <+sburjan`> but if you're unable to rteproduce, Monday I will take another look at it  
04:01 <@sdumitriu> I tried on the test machine  
04:01 <+sburjan`> hmm .. oodd, I tested on that machine also  
04:01 <+sburjan`> I will investigate more monday  
04:02 <@sdumitriu> Maybe some IE special settings  
04:02 <@sdumitriu> I used XWikiTester2  
04:03 <+sburjan`> I don't remember the user I tested with on the IE8 macine.  
04:03 <+sburjan`> \*machine  
04:03 <+sburjan`> anyway ... the issues were fixed very rapidly  
04:04 <+sburjan`> I guess monday the release will be started .. after the blocker is fixed  
04:05 <@sdumitriu> Yep, if cjdelisle finds a safe solution that can solve both issues, not leaking PR in the page, and letting PR check work in Java  
04:06 <@sdumitriu> Permissions only affect code called from Velocity, right?  
04:07 <@sdumitriu> We can use a marker somewhere, when inside VelocityEnginee#evaluate,  rights can be disabled  
04:08 <+sburjan`> I have no idea. I stil don't know why annotations (including annotations tab) is injected  
04:08 <+sburjan`> using js  
04:09 <+sburjan`> but afaik PR is checked against velocity and groovy .. so you can't do dangerous scripting with it  
04:23 <sdumitriu> has quit  
06:01 <Denis> has quit  
06:09 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
07:40 <xipe> has quit  
07:41 <xipe> has joined #xwiki  
08:23 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:56 <vmassol> alternative to velocity for us (we could provide it): http://scalate.fusesource.org/  
09:00 <@cjdelisle> That's interesting. The lisp dialects are one branch of code I never really looked in to.  
09:03 <@cjdelisle> obligatory: http://imgs.xkcd.com/comics/lisp.jpg  
09:15 <vmassol> :)  
09:55 <Denis> has quit  
10:13 <Pline> has joined #xwiki  
10:13 <Pline> has left #xwiki  
10:14 <@cjdelisle> heh  
10:23 <@cjdelisle> it seems we have a template which uses $xcontext.get(). I added a throw->catch->printStackTrace to the dropPermissions line and it is printing that when running the test.  
11:30 <+sburjan`> cjdelisle: who did you ban ?  
11:40 <@cjdelisle> spammer  
11:40 <@cjdelisle> malware spam woohoo  
11:43 <@cjdelisle> hmm pretty clever one too. spammed #bittorrent too and still not klined.  
11:49 <@cjdelisle> note to self. 200MB insert statements are bad  
11:50 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
12:03 <@cjdelisle>  #set ($xcontext.tocData = $tocData)  
12:03 <@cjdelisle> umm... what doe sit do?  
12:30 <@cjdelisle> It seems there are a number pf places where c.x.x.api.Context.get is used in the templates which ofc requires PR or returns null.  
12:49 <vmassol> cjdelisle: did you see XAANNOTATIONS-46 ?  
12:50 <@cjdelisle> Yes and I am working on it now.  
12:50 <vmassol> nice :)  
12:50 <@cjdelisle> I have enabled logging of PR checks and turned up a bunch of problems in the templates.  
12:51 <@cjdelisle> I am writing mail now to propose deprecating the $context.something pattern since if there is no $context.getSomething() it defaults to $context.get('something') and that checks PR and returns null of no pr is present.  
12:52 <@cjdelisle> AKA no error checking, "once in a while bugs" since when there is PR a line which usually works ok having null suddenly has an object which it cannot handle.  
12:53 <@cjdelisle> + I can fix all of the current issues right away using sed ;)  
13:25 <vmassol1> has joined #xwiki  
13:26 <vmassol> has quit  
13:46 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
13:52 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
14:22 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
14:22 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
15:18 <nuvolari> has quit  
15:19 <nuvolari> has joined #xwiki  
15:22 <sburjan`> has quit  
15:25 <abusenius> has quit  
15:25 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
15:31 <sburjan`> has joined #xwiki  
15:39 <vmassol1> guys I'm going to start the rendering move… build will be broken for some time  
15:43 <vmassol1> hmmm svn errors in committing…. need to find out why…  
15:43 <vmassol1> jvelociter: any idea why wikimanager seems not enabled on xwiki.org? I remember creating a subwiki with it just before my holidays  
15:44 <vmassol1> http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/WikiManager/  
15:44 <+jvelociter> vmassol1: no idea  
15:44 <+jvelociter> hmm  
15:44 <+jvelociter> let me check something  
15:45 <vmassol1> btw I'm getting this error while trying to commit: http://pastebin.com/MUYJEhCv  
15:46 <vmassol1> maybe it's because rendering.xwiki.org doesn't exist yet (hence why I'd like to create it)  
15:46 <vmassol1> but the svn error message is strange  
15:51 <vmassol1> jvelociter: hmm I see both plugins enabled in xwiki.cfg on xwiki.org  
15:51 <+jvelociter> are the jars there ?  
15:52 <vmassol1> checking  
15:52 <vmassol1> hmm no  
15:52 <vmassol1> they're not there  
15:52 <+jvelociter> ok  
15:52 <+jvelociter> I think it's my fault  
15:52 <+jvelociter> :)  
15:52 <vmassol1> ah  
15:52 <+jvelociter> one sec I will fix this  
15:52 <vmassol1> ok  
15:53 <+jvelociter> ah no it's not my fault :)  
15:53 <+jvelociter> I think it's because Raluca first forgot to release wiki manager together with XEM 2.6.2  
15:54 <+jvelociter> no, actually it's my fault  
15:54 <vmassol1> what's the relationship with xwiki.org?  
15:54 <vmassol1> xwiki.org is on a patched 2.6  
15:54 <+jvelociter> took XE-2.6.2 instead of XEM-2.6.2  
15:54 <+jvelociter> no  
15:54 <vmassol1> you upgraded?  
15:54 <+jvelociter> I've upgraded it  
15:54 <vmassol1> ah ok didn't know that  
15:54 <+jvelociter> forgot to mention that on the upgrade page  
15:54 <+jvelociter> will do  
15:55 <vmassol1> you could have upgraded to 2.7.1 at the same time…  
15:55 <vmassol1> :)  
18:36 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
18:36 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
18:37 <tmortagne> has left #xwiki  
18:38 <jvelociter> has quit  
18:41 <jvelociter> has joined #xwiki  
19:52 <@sdumitriu> jvelociter: Are you here?  
19:55 <@cjdelisle> Oh, thankyou for spotting my mistake with hasPR. I have a local change to make it only affect hasPR(context) and not hasPR(doc, context). I am in the process of testing it.  
20:01 <+jvelociter> hi sdumitriu  
20:02 <+jvelociter> I'm there  
21:12 <SvenDowideit> has quit  
21:12 <SvenDowideit> has joined #xwiki  
21:15 <jvdrean> has quit  
21:27 <@sdumitriu> jvelociter: Can you grant me access on the hudson.xwiki.org machine?  
21:39 <mflorea> has quit  
21:47 <vmassol1> sdumitriu: disabling rendering's build FTM since it's sending too many emails (till we fix the agent)  
21:48 <@sdumitriu> I don't think it's the agent  
21:48 <vmassol1> you think it's the server?  
21:48 <@sdumitriu> I did -Xmx1024m and it still reports OOM, while on the machine the process uses 56m of total memory  
21:48 <vmassol1> I can restart it  
21:48 <vmassol1> hudson I mean  
21:49 <vmassol1> or have you tried already?  
21:49 <@sdumitriu> I think the master has the OOM, not the agent  
21:49 <@sdumitriu> No, I don't have access to hudson  
21:49 <vmassol1> I think I have access let me try  
21:51 <vmassol1> hmm I have access but I don't have the password for a su  
21:51 <vmassol1> which is needed for a stop/start  
21:51 <vmassol1> jvelociter: can you help?  
21:52 <vmassol1> hmm since I'm the maven user I probably don't need the su , let me try without  
21:53 <vmassol1> ok done  
21:55 <vmassol1> I'll try a manual build once it's back  
21:55 <vmassol1> I wonder why it takes so much time to start, seen in the RN that they've improved the start speed in more recent version, I'd like to try an upgrade to jenkins tomorrow btw  
21:58 <vmassol1> seems hudson is back on track  
22:01 <@sdumitriu> And it's building  
23:08 <vmassol1> has quit  
23:44 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki
